subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings
I am Mr. Peter Ben, Kay Account Manager in well-known Bank, herein
London, England.
However, I have already sent you this same letter by post one month
ago, but I am not sure that the letter promptly gets to you since I
have not heard from you, now i am re-sending it again.
I discovered a dormant account in my office, as Group Accountant with
AhliUnited Bank (UK).
It will be in my interest to transfer this fund worth of Â£68.5M pounds
(Sixty Eight Million Five hundred thousand pounds) in an account
offshore.
Can you be my partner?
Regards and respect,
Mr. Peter Ben

subject: Re:   Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Peter Ben,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate you taking the time to share this information with me.

I must admit, your proposal sounds quite intriguing. However, I would like to know more details about the dormant account and the process of transferring the funds offshore. Could you please provide me with some additional information? 

Also, I'm curious to know why you have chosen me as your partner for this endeavor. Is there something specific that caught your attention or made you believe that I would be a suitable candidate?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Irma
